explanation: [0-0] In a courtyard paved with granite, the surrounding walls are brown. In the center of the courtyard, Hulk sits on the ground with his legs apart, wearing tattered gray jeans and bare-chested, his hands resting on his thighs. In front of him is a pile of brown objects, while behind him is a potted plant and Captain America's shield.

[0-4] Hulk first lowers his head, opens his mouth to stare at the pile of brown objects in front of him, then reaches out and puts the objects into his mouth one by one, eating five pieces in a row. After eating, he turns his head and looks around.

[4-7] When Hulk's head turns to the right, the camera also moves to the right, where four cows and a Spider-Man can be seen. There is a pile of cow dung on the ground behind each cow, and Spider-Man stands behind the fourth cow, holding a red shovel. A portrait of a ghost face hangs on the brown wall behind him. As Spider-Man looks up and then down, the camera zooms in, then follows his movements closely. He moves to the left while shoveling cow dung from the ground.

[7-10] Finally, the camera zooms out, and you can see Spider-Man coming to Hulk with the shovel. Hulk watches Spider-Man, and when Spider-Man glances at Hulk, the screen suddenly switches. Sitting in the same spot, Hulk looks to the right, with another pile of cow dung in front of him. Hulk turns his head, looks down at the pile of cow dung, then covers his mouth in surprise and looks up. In the end, the picture returns to how it was at the beginning.
